org.jgrapes.core

Interface Channel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Eligible
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DefaultChannel, IOSubchannel, Self
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClassChannel, Component, FileStorage, Handler.NoChannel, HandlingErrorPrinter, HttpServer, IOSubchannel.DefaultSubchannel, LinkedIOSubchannel, NamedChannel, NioDispatcher, Server, Server.Connection, StaticContentDispatcher

    public interface Channel
extends Eligible

    Classes that implements this interface can be used as a communication bus for sending events between components.

    For ordinary usage, the implementing classes ClassChannel and NamedChannel should be sufficient. If another type of Channel is needed, its implementation of this interface must make sure that Eligible.isEligibleFor(Object) returns true if called with Channel.class as parameter, else channels of the new type will not participate in broadcasts.

    Objects of type Channel must be immutable.

    See Also:
    BROADCAST

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Channel BROADCAST
      A special channel that can be used to send events to all components.
      static Channel SELF
      A special channel object that can be passed to the constructor of Component.Component(Channel).

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.jgrapes.core.Eligible

        getDefaultCriterion, isEligibleFor
